page.title: Jin–Song Wars

infobox.caption: jin dynasty (blue) and song dynasty (orange) in 1141
infobox.alt: map of china in 1141 with jin dynasty controlling the north and southern song dynasty controlling the south
infobox.date:
november 1125 – 9 february, 1234
* 1125–42, jin conquest of northern china
* 1161–65, jin emperor [[battle of caishi#preparation for war|wanyan liang's war]]
* 1206–08, song revanchist war
* 1217–24, jin–song war after the [[mongol conquest of the jin dynasty|mongol invasion of jin]] in 1211
* 1233–34, jin fall to [[siege of caizhou|mongol–song siege]]
infobox.result:
* jurchens conquer northern china
* song court moves south to [[hangzhou|lin'an]]
* southern song dynasty period begins

page.title: Mongol conquest of the Jin dynasty

infobox.conflict: mongol conquest of the jin dynasty
infobox.caption: an illustration of the [[battle of yehuling]] during the mongol–jin war
infobox.result:
decisive mongol–song victory
*destruction of the jin dynasty
infobox.territorial changes: north china added to the [[mongol empire]]
infobox.combatant1:
{{plainlist|
*[[mongol empire]]
**[[khitan people|khitans]] ([[eastern liao]])
**[[western xia]] (1210–1219)
*[[song dynasty]]<ref>{{cite book|last1=haywood|first1=john|last2=jotischky|first2=andrew|last3=mcglynn|first3=sean|title=historical atlas of the medieval world, ad 600–1492|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=yqmungaacaaj|year=1998|publisher=barnes & noble|isbn=978-0-7607-1976-3|pages=3.21}}</ref> (1233–34)}}
infobox.commander1:
{{plainlist|
*[[genghis khan]] {{dow}}
*[[jebe]]
*[[muqali]]
*boal (bor)
*doqolqu
*[[tolui]]
*[[ögedei]]
*[[subutai]]
*[[shi tianze]]
*[[zhang hongfan]]
*[[zhang rou]]
*[[yan shi]]
*[[liu heima]] (liu ni)
*[[xiao zhala]]
*[[guo kan]]}}
infobox.strength1:
{{plainlist|
*approx 90,000–120,000 horse archers
*40,000 northern han chinese defectors
*30,000 khitan defectors
*[[song dynasty]] lent 300,000 soldiers to the mongols in 1234 after the death of genghis khan.}}
infobox.strength2: 30,000–50,000 (1212, in the [[battle of yehuling]])<ref name="sverdrup">{{cite journal |first=carl |last=sverdrup |title=numbers in mongol warfare |journal=journal of medieval military history |publisher=boydell press |volume=8 |pages=109–17 [p. 116] |year=2010 |isbn=978-1-84383-596-7}}</ref><br />200,000 (1231)<br />100,000 (1233)

page.title: Mongol conquest of the Song dynasty

infobox.conflict: mongol conquest of the song dynasty
infobox.partof: [[mongol invasion of china]] and [[kublai khan's campaigns]]
infobox.caption: southern song before mongol world conquests, areas of xia and jin dynasties were controlled by the mongols in 1228.
infobox.territory: southern china added into the [[yuan dynasty]]
infobox.commander1: [[ögedei]]<br>[[chagaan|tsagaan]]<br>[[khochu]]<br>[[töregene]]<br>[[güyük khan]]<br>[[möngke khan]] (possibly {{kia}})<br>[[kublai]]<br>[[bayan of the baarin|bayan]]<br>[[aju]]<br>[[arikhgiya]]<br>general [[shi tianze]]<ref name="rachewiltz1993">{{cite book|author=igor de rachewiltz|title=in the service of the khan: eminent personalities of the early mongol-yüan period (1200-1300)|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=kg45gi7e3hsc&pg=pa42#v=onepage&q&f=false|year=1993|publisher=otto harrassowitz verlag|isbn=978-3-447-03339-8|pages=42–}}</ref><br>general [[zhang hongfan]]<br>general [[zhang rou]]<br>general [[guo kan]]<br>kiung [[duan xingzhi]] of dali
infobox.commander2: [[emperor lizong of song]]<br>[[emperor duzong of song]]<br>[[emperor gong of song]]<br>[[emperor duanzong of song]]<br>[[emperor bing of song]]{{kia}}<br>[[jia sidao]]<br>lü wenhuan<br>li tingzhi<br>[[zhang shijie]]<br>[[wen tianxiang]]
infobox.strength1: more than 600,000 (an initial coalition invasion force of ninety [[tumen (unit)|tumen]]s at roughly two-thirds strength, including [[mongols]], khitans, jurchens, han chinese people, alan [[asud]]s, turkic people, central asians, cuan-bo [[bai people]] and [[yi people]] from the kingdom of dali)

page.title: Battle of Yamen

infobox.caption: a park in commemoration of the battle in [[xinhui]], [[jiangmen]], [[guangdong]]
infobox.result:
[[decisive victory|decisive]] yuan victory
*fall of the song dynasty
infobox.territory: yuan rule over [[china proper|all of china]]
infobox.strength1: 200,000 people, mostly non-combatants – song court officials and servants <br>1,000+ ships, mostly transport ships with warship escorts. their actual fighting capacity of soldiers probably numbered in the tens of thousands.
infobox.casualties1: at least 100,000 died either from fighting or drowning, the rest fled

page.title: Mongol conquest of China

infobox.caption: mongol conquest of chinese regimes
infobox.result:
decisive mongol empire/yuan dynasty victory
*establishment of [[yuan dynasty]]
*destruction of the [[western xia]], [[jin dynasty (1115–1234)]], [[dali kingdom]], and [[southern song dynasty]]
infobox.territory: all of china added to the [[yuan dynasty]]
infobox.combatant1:
[[mongol empire]]/[[yuan dynasty]]
* [[western xia]] (1210–1219)
* [[han chinese]]
* [[khitan people|khitans]]
* [[alans]] ([[asud]])
* [[turkic peoples|turkics]]
* cuan-bo [[bai people]] and [[yi people]] from the [[kingdom of dali]])
[[southern song dynasty]] (1211–1234)
[[dali kingdom]] (1253-1279)
infobox.commander1: [[genghis khan]] (possibly {{kia}})<br />[[jebe]]<br />[[muqali]] <br />boal (bor)<br />doqolqu<br />[[tolui]]<br />[[ögedei khan|ögedei]]<br />[[subutai]]<br />[[chagaan]]<br>[[kublai khan]]<br />[[khochu]]<br />[[töregene]]<br />[[güyük khan]]<br />[[möngke khan]] (possibly {{kia}})<br />[[bayan of the baarin|bayan]]<br />[[aju]]<br />[[arikhgiya]]<br />general [[shi tianze]]<br />general [[zhang hongfan]]<br />general [[zhang rou]]<br />general [[yan shi]]<br />general [[liu heima]] (liu ni)<br />general [[xiao zhala]]<br />general uryankhadai<br />general [[guo kan]]<br />king [[duan xingzhi]] of dali
infobox.commander2: [[Emperor Huanzong of Western Xia|Emperor Huanzong]]<br />Emperor [[Li Anquan]]<br />Kao Liang-Hui<br />Wei-ming Ling-kung<br />[[Wanyan Yongji]] {{KIA|Assassinated}}<br />[[Emperor Xuanzong of Jin]] {{KIA}}<br />Li Ying<br />Moran Jinzhong<br />[[Emperor Aizong of Jin]] {{KIA|Suicide}}<br />[[Wanyan Heda]]<br />[[Puxian Wannu]]<br />[[Pucha Guannu]]<br />[[Ma Yong]]<br />[[Emperor Mo of Jin]] {{KIA}}<br />[[Emperor Xianzong of Western Xia|Emperor Xianzong]]<br />[[Emperor Mozhu of Western Xia|Emperor Mozhu]] {{executed}}<br />(1226–1227)<br />Asha<br />King [[Duan Xingzhi]] of Dali (defected to Mongols)<br>[[Emperor Lizong]]<br />[[Emperor Duzong]]<br />[[Emperor Gong of Song]]<br />[[Emperor Duanzong]]<br />[[Emperor Bing of Song]]{{KIA}}<br />[[Jia Sidao]]<br />Lü Wenhuan<br />Li Tingzhi<br />[[Zhang Shijie]]<br />[[Wen Tianxiang]]
